title: Rose-Tinted Diamond Cascade Haaram Set with Statement Earrings
materials: High-Quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) Diamonds with Excellent Cut and Clarity. Features a durable Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster and shine.
features: This stunning set features a contemporary Haaram design, with a cascading arrangement of intricately designed diamond-studded links. The necklace culminates in a magnificent, diamond-studded pendant. The diamond lattice pattern is interspersed with geometric shapes with floral accents. The accompanying earrings mirror the necklace's design, featuring a diamond-studded motif with a geometric drop. The links provide flexibility and comfort while wearing.
colors: Rose Gold and White Gold with brilliant white diamond accents
creating a harmonious and eye-catching color palette.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Its modern design also suits contemporary events and celebrations.
description: This exquisite set combines modern aesthetics with timeless elegance. The high-quality CZ diamonds provide exceptional sparkle and brilliance, mimicking the look of real diamonds at an accessible price point. The Hyderabadi Polish ensures long-lasting shine and durability. The rose and white gold combination adds a touch of contemporary sophistication, making it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection.
